children.subject: I believe the only way to drop after the late drop deadline is to withdraw from the entire semester. I'd make an advising appointment to discuss duplicated credits on your transcript.

history.content: I believe it won't appear twice in your transcript. I transferred 61B from CC, also took it here, and only Berkeley 61B shows up on my transcript (both show up on my APR though). If you don't want Berkeley 61A to be part of your Cal/declaration GPA that's a different story though. Either way it's best to make an appointment with your advisor as the followup said.

Hi,

I'm a transfer student, and I just completed my first semester at UCB. Back in January, my transcript wasn't complete, and I didn't know if the credit for 61A would transfer, so I signed up for 61A during spring 2021 anyways. 

Now, that my credit was successfully transferred from another school, is there any way to drop the 61A I took this semester so it's not appearing twice in my transcript?

Thanks a lot!

Best,
Noel
history.subject: Transferred 61A
